mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar ( cal_id, cal_title, cal_content, pet_id, user_id, cal_date ) VALUES ( cal_seq.nextval, #{cal_title}, #{cal_content}, #{pet_id}, #{user_id}, TO_DATE(#{cal_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(cal_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "date" FROM calendar WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND cal_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(cal_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(cal_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

SELECT cal_id, cal_title, cal_content, pet_id, user_id, TO_CHAR(cal_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS cal_date FROM calendar WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND cal_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ORDER BY cal_date

SELECT TO_CHAR(cal_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS date, TO_CHAR(cal_date, 'DD') AS day, 1 AS hasSchedule FROM calendar WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND cal_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') GROUP BY cal_date ORDER BY cal_date
